incidents.title: Flight status API outage
incidents.description: Flight status API was unavailable for 45 minutes, affecting real-time cargo tracking.
incidents.root_cause: Expired SSL certificate on upstream provider.
incidents.resolution: Renewed certificate and restarted API gateway.

incidents.title: Cargo overbooking incident
incidents.description: System allowed booking of 120% cargo capacity on flight AF123. Manual intervention required.
